refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This file was added in Shorewall 4.4.15 and is used to define routes to be added to provider routing tables.
The columns in the file are as follows.

listitem.para: The name or number of a provider defined in shorewall6-providers (5).
Destination host address or network address.
If specified, gives the IP address of the gateway to the DEST.
Specifies the device route. If neither DEVICE nor GATEWAY is given, then the INTERFACE specified for the PROVIDER in shorewall6-providers (5).
